As indicated in the title, there is dual English and Hindi audio. I played this file with VLC and the audio was defaulted on English. Hindi and English subtitles are also included. Just as a note, the symbol "WOWOW" appears in the top right corner of the screen about 30 minutes into the film. Not a big deal, just mentioning it.
